titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2216) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-105, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2216 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Waives all points of order against the bill. The amendment printed in Part A of H.Rept. 107-105 shall be considered as adopted. Makes in order the amendment printed in Part B of H. Rept. 107-105 and waives all points of order against the amendment. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments. Authorizes the Chair to accord priority in recognitions to Members who have pre-printed their amendments in the Congressional Record.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 42.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 171.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 205 (Roll no. 169).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 205 (Roll no. 170).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/20/2001--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2216 (FY 2001 supplemental appropriations).
